short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an easy access grades button to the sidebar on Canvas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings new and useful features right to your Canvas dashboard. With a new grades shortcut on the left side along with a sorted list (for when your professors do not close their canvas classes) you now have access to enhanced features with more soon to come.
